data.market_trends: A noticeable increase in winter bookings for tropical destinations is observed, indicating a potential surge in Thailand tourism.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers are prioritizing budget-friendly options while seeking unique experiences. Cultural immersion is also becoming a tourist priority.
data.competitive_landscape: Thailand's competitive edge lies in its well-established tourism infrastructure and a variety of activities appealing to diverse travelers.
data.seasonal_factors: December and January are high-demand months due to holiday breaks promoting travel and vacation. Various festivals attract large tourist crowds.
